about_the_game:
Fog Horror - is a co-op and single-player game where you find yourself in an unknown, inconvenient place for you, you are looking for a variety of items to better move around the location and get out of it, you have a choice of firearms and cold weapons, as well as various items for a better understanding of the terrain, you can draw various notes on the map

In the game, everyone is waiting for extremely uncomfortable nights, where you will be scared not by ordinary screamers, but by an oppressive atmosphere, because you can kill monsters that are trying to kill you

Features

  • A creepy atmosphere that will make the gameplay more cautious and exasperating
  • Multiplayer, you can play with friends and also alone
  • Monsters are waiting for you who are eager to kill you, but you have to be braver to kill them
  • Firearms and edged weapons
  • Different maps and locations
detailed_description:
FOLLOW US


About the Game

Fog Horror - is a co-op and single-player game where you find yourself in an unknown, inconvenient place for you, you are looking for a variety of items to better move around the location and get out of it, you have a choice of firearms and cold weapons, as well as various items for a better understanding of the terrain, you can draw various notes on the map

In the game, everyone is waiting for extremely uncomfortable nights, where you will be scared not by ordinary screamers, but by an oppressive atmosphere, because you can kill monsters that are trying to kill you

Features

  • A creepy atmosphere that will make the gameplay more cautious and exasperating
  • Multiplayer, you can play with friends and also alone
  • Monsters are waiting for you who are eager to kill you, but you have to be braver to kill them
  • Firearms and edged weapons
  • Different maps and locations
name: Fog Horror

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 last update
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX End-User Runtimes (June 2010)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 last update
  • Processor: i5 8400 Intel or Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card

short_description: Fog Horror — psychological horror game. You'll fall into oppressive atmosphere here. Watch out hostile entities entire the viscose void!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
